title: Euromillions results LIVE - the winning Lottery numbers for Friday, October 4
text:
Yes, you read that right - the Euromillions jackpot is an incredible £169million tonight.

Excitement is at fever pitch as hopeful punters flock to the shops to grab a ticket for their chance to become one of the richest people in the country with one single Lotto draw.

Tonight we'll bring you the results live, and in real time. Stay with us for the Euromillions draw and the Thunderball draw. Scroll down to get the results as they come in.

The Thunderball draw will take place at 8.15pm as it always does. While the Euromillions results normally come out at around 8.20pm.

Come back to this page around then to get the results you need to know.

A win tonight would make you one of the biggest Lottery winners of all time.

You can grab tickets up to 7.30pm.

Andy Carter, senior winners’ advisor at The National Lottery, said: “The fantastic £169m EuroMillions jackpot is still waiting to be won.

"Players are urged to get their tickets early for Friday’s draw (4 October) which could make the country’s biggest ever winner.

“As the jackpot is now capped, tonight’s draw has seen 7 players bank bigger prizes for matching five numbers and just one Lucky Star. Five lucky UK players each won £1.7m.

“Remember, every EuroMillions ticket sold helps contribute to the more than £30m raised every week for Good Causes by The National Lottery.”
description: The pan-European Lotto draw is here with a massive £169million jackpot - grab your ticket now
